official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that clinical social worker services are a mandatory benefit under the medicaid program.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require States to cover clinical social worker services under the Medicaid program.

titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that clinical social worker services are a mandatory benefit under the medicaid program.
